title: Ministry of Defense of Belarus: a comprehensive check of the combat readiness of formations and military units has begun in t...
content: Ministry of Defense of Belarus: a comprehensive check of the combat readiness of formations and military units has begun in the Armed Forces. The personnel will have to move to designated areas and conduct a series of exercises and training, including live fire. During the inspection, the movement of military equipment is planned, and it is possible to temporarily restrict the movement of civilian transport on public roads and areas.
author: Live UA Map
